content: Thank all the gods for tax returns! We threw ours, plus some extra, at the portion of my spouse’s loans that were 4.5% interest. The remaining of my private loan and his student loan are both now 3.5%.Citibank Student Loan — end of January: $6,873, end of February: $6,690Spouse Student Loan — end January: $8,262, end of February: $5,206
